Class PercolationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.kzoo.grid.gui.SteppedGridAppController
      • PercolationController

  • public abstract class PercolationController
extends edu.kzoo.grid.gui.SteppedGridAppController
    A PercolationController controls the running of a percolation application.
    Version:
    23 April 2009
    Author:
    Alyce Brady

      protected void adjustToNewGrid()
      Re-initializes anything that is necessary when the grid changes (called by setGrid and randomlyFillGrid).

      Populates the top row with the current percolation type.

      Returns which controller is being used.
      abstract boolean hasReachedStoppingState()
      Determines whether a running application has reached a desired stopping state.
      protected void invisibleRun()
      Complete a run of the percolation simulation without involving the graphical user interface (no display between steps).
      protected static java.lang.Object newObject(java.lang.Class c, java.lang.String type)
      Instantiates a new object.
      abstract void notePercolationTo(edu.kzoo.grid.GridObject newObj)
      Takes note of the fact that the material has percolated, creating the given new percolation material object.
      protected boolean percolatedToBottom()
      Returns true if the percolating material percolated to the bottom.
      void randomlyFillGrid(int density, java.lang.Class percType)
      Populates the grid with random solid cells based on a porousness/density factor and fills in the top row with a percolating material of the given type.
      void runExperiments(java.lang.Class currentPercType)
      Run a series of density experiments.
      void runExperiments(int numRuns, int minDensity, int maxDensity, int increment, java.lang.Class currentPercType)
      Run a series of density experiments, running the simulation numRuns times with each of a variety of densities, from minDensity to maxDensity, incrementing the density percentage by increment between each set of runs.
      void runNTimes(int numTimes, int density, java.lang.Class currentPercType)
      Runs the percolation simulation multiple times, keeping track of the number of times the percolation material percolated to the bottom.

      Notes which controller is being used.

      • randomlyFillGrid

        public void randomlyFillGrid(int density,
                             java.lang.Class percType)
        Populates the grid with random solid cells based on a porousness/density factor and fills in the top row with a percolating material of the given type.
        Parameters:
        density - percentage of grid that should be filled with solid cells
        percType - type of percolating material to put in top row

      • runExperiments

        public void runExperiments(java.lang.Class currentPercType)
        Run a series of density experiments.

      • runExperiments

        public void runExperiments(int numRuns,
                           int minDensity,
                           int maxDensity,
                           int increment,
                           java.lang.Class currentPercType)
        Run a series of density experiments, running the simulation numRuns times with each of a variety of densities, from minDensity to maxDensity, incrementing the density percentage by increment between each set of runs.
        Parameters:
        numRuns - how many times to run the simulation with each density
        minDensity - minimum density to test with a set of runs
        maxDensity - maximum density to test with a set of runs
        increment - the increment to use
        currentPercType - current percolation type to use

      • runNTimes

        public void runNTimes(int numTimes,
                      int density,
                      java.lang.Class currentPercType)
        Runs the percolation simulation multiple times, keeping track of the number of times the percolation material percolated to the bottom.
        Parameters:
        numTimes - how many times to run the simulation with the given density
        density - density to use for this set of runs
        currentPercType - current percolation type to use

      • setController

        protected static void setController(PercolationController c)
        Notes which controller is being used.

        public void setGrid(edu.kzoo.grid.Grid grid)
        Sets the application's grid. (Precondition: grid is not null.)
        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        grid - the Grid to act on
